elements.label: Rest
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Dream verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Restless
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Dream verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Explorable
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Explore verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Not Explorable
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Explore verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Studyable
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Study verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Not Studyable
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Study verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Talkable
elements.description: Something I can talk to, or about
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Talk verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Not Talkable
elements.description: Something I can't talk to, or about
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Talk verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Workable
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Work verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Not Workable
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Work verb as the primary subject.
